attributes.additional_details: The current government has had an historically unprecedented series of catastrophic errors, mismanagement and damaging failures in the past couple of years. They are not operating in the interests of the people or country and urgent change is required to regain some stability.
attributes.background: Hold a General Election to provide a fully mandated & unified government to best represent the urgent need for stability during the current unprecedented economic & cost of living crisis.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
